message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll be interested in. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I'm interested in purchasing it, but I can only afford to pay up to $100.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see that you're willing to pay $100, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $105?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
I'm still a bit above your budget, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers. How about $100.50?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $98 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob, but I'm still willing to negotiate. How about we meet at $101.50?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $99 for the product.
I'm getting a bit desperate, Bob, but I'm still holding out for a better deal. How about we meet at $102.25?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $99.5 for the product.
